Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Consuela
Reviews.Content: It looks good and over all its awesome. The cameras are great quality.  The call quality is great too Over all its a great phone I recommend it to everyone

Reviews.Title: Amazing phone
Reviews.Author: IceT
Reviews.Content: This phone is amazing. It has everything stated in the description. This phone is an HTC Droid DNA clone. It is very nice. The screen is very responsive. Amazing camera. Here are some specs:Brand: AlpsModel: 01_v89zlh_hdOS:4.2.1CPU model: Quad Core ARMv7 ProcessorGPU Render: PowerVR SGX 544MPResolution: 720x1280Rear Camera: 12.6 MP (4096x3072)Memory: 1GBRAM: 971MBFront Camera: 4.9 MP 2560x1920The first guy that rated this poorly obviously doesnt know anything about phones and assumes that all of these clones are bad. Dont take his review seriously because he did not buy it.

Reviews.Title: More better than i expected,amazing phone!!
Reviews.Author: hanchir emmanuel
Reviews.Content: Wowwww what phone,this is a very nice build,solid,i was afraid to buy chinese phone but when i open the box,i was very impessed.He came with 2 battery,headphone,usb cable and plug and i nice protect covert case!I open the phone,android work very nice,is 4.1.2 and the phone is very fast,reactiv,solid,nice look to with hd screen.The call is ok,the camera is realy 5 mo front and 13 mo back,he make a very nice pictures and vidéos.Play store work well,wifi to,i need just try 3g but thonk is ok to.All aplications run well,mini sd card 32gb class 10 accepted and wowww i paid 198$ for a phone like this,this is my best deal,when i see the price of iphone,galaxy s etc........you can put 2 sim to,i recomended this phone!!!!!!!This is 3 months now i use this phone,no one freez,camera work well for pictures,video call work very well(skype and oovoo),i read 720p video with vlc app without freez,i'am so happy to buy this phone.I have now 2 diferent sim and work well in 3g to,i definitively recommanded this phone!!!!!

Reviews.Title: What a Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: Y. B. Anaglate
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone in November 2013 for my own use and i must say that I have not regretted at all. When the phone was delivered to me by FedEx, I told myself what a well-designed android phone with Cortex A7 Quad Core 1.2Ghz. This phone has a great picture quality and am really impressed.Please android phone lovers, I will recommend this phone to you all. It's money worth and you won't regret it at all.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone. Works Well. Price Is A Little High.
Reviews.Author: Andriy
Reviews.Content: Nice phone. Good camera. Nice color. Good sound. Phone case was white/pink, & no screen protector - didn't like that. Deliver time was 4-5 weeks. I might order it again.

Reviews.Title: Can not beat the price
Reviews.Author: Cesar J. Vado
Reviews.Content: I truly love the phone it is fast, works like a dream, and looks good. I only have two small complain and it not just with this phone but two other phone that I order from China and that is when you installed the Sims card it does not pick up the internet from the service provided, you have to go in the setting and put in the information for the VPN setting. The second problem is I have not been able to buy a leather cover for it to protect the phone in Amazon it seems that all the cover are just for iphone and Samsung if someone out there  knows where I can buy a leather case please let me know..

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money on this piece of crap!!!
Reviews.Author: ANDY MIDENCE
Reviews.Content: Don't make the same mistake i did buying this piece of crap!!!! Nothing advertised on this web page about this phone is thru,the camera is crap as the rest of this phone,cheap material cheap performance!!!!!

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: King Son
Reviews.Content: it arrived on time, and was in perfect condition...the picture was perfectly shot and the camera and sound works like a charm...my only concern was that the sound was not clear at times....when calls were being received

Reviews.Title: The phone and customer serv.
Reviews.Author: LLE
Reviews.Content: The phone is great for it's price, very nice camera futures on it. Also good customer service, very sensitive and satisfying.

Reviews.Title: did not make the cut
Reviews.Author: sheth hunter
Reviews.Content: Phone did not meet expectations. The touch screen sensor went out the first day. Was nota good experience. Might not try antitheti another

Reviews.Title: Obvious ripoff
Reviews.Author: D. S. Adams
Reviews.Content: As much as I love to see Samsung get copied for a change, I couldn't help but notice that a number of these cheap Chinese knockoffs of Android phones have the same reviews from the same person! Add to that the fact that they list the version of Android as 4.1.2 and call it "froyo," and it's pretty clear that these are invitations to a ripoff.
